content.raw: I'm not suggesting we change this pull request, but couldn't the "removing `Get` from function names" part of this pull request have been separated? I think it would be easier to review separately. Maybe something to consider for future pull requests?
content.html: I'm not suggesting we change this pull request, but couldn't the "removing Get from function names" part of this pull request have been separated? I think it would be easier to review separately. Maybe something to consider for future pull requests?
